column2: LindsayJ, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: I love this stuff! My allergies are horrendous and these drops are the only thing to give me relief at night. I use them before bed to stop the redness and itchiness I experience. My doctor suggested I store them in the fridge because the cold feeling of the drops will be soothing. He was right! I've never had any issues with side effects (dilation, etc.)

column2: Gordon, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Worked great itching in eye went away after use.  Plan on using again.

column2: 65-74 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: It relieved the itching but about 2 hours after using the drops severe dizziness, nausea and sweating set in.  The dizziness remained for over 24 hours. Was unable to drive or go to work.
It stopped the itching...but like other reviews pupils became dilated as well and vision became blurry. Used this before and this is the first time this happened.

column2: blooper, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Pupils dilated so as the iris was almost not visible.Heart began to race; even awoke me during the night. I do NOT take any prescriptions, but apparently this IS a (rare) side effect.

column2: berykute, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Unpleasant side effects of blurred vision and dilated pupil in treated eye. These side effects should be on the label.

column2: 13-18 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Around 20 minutes after using these eye drops the pupil in the eye i used it on got very large.
This medication doesn't cause "blindness" - anyone saying such a thing is full-of-it.
this  medication caused blindness in my vision
